snippet: Those who know her best hope that Hillary Rodham Clinton, who is renowned for her grueling schedule, will take some time to rest after being released from the hospital this week.
abstract: Sec of State Hillary Clinton's health scare, in which she was diagnosed with blood clot in her head after concussion, reinforces concerns of friends and colleagues that years of punishing work and grueling travel schedule have taken heavy toll on her.
lead_paragraph: Those who know her best hope that Hillary Rodham Clinton, who is renowned for her grueling schedule, will take some time to rest after being released from the hospital this week.

headline.seo: Scare Amplifies Fears That Clinton’s Work Has Taken Heavy Toll
headline.main: Scare Adds to Fears That Clinton’s Work Has Taken Toll
headline.print_headline: Scare Amplifies Fears That Clinton’s Work Has Taken Heavy Toll
